001package ca.gc.cra.radar.api;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.pipeline.AssembleUseCase;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.config.AssembleConfig;
005import ca.gc.cra.radar.config.CompositionRoot;
006import ca.gc.cra.radar.config.IoMode;
007import ca.gc.cra.radar.logging.LoggingConfigurator;
008import ca.gc.cra.radar.validation.Paths;
009import java.io.IOException;
010import java.nio.file.Files;
011import java.nio.file.Path;
012import java.util.Map;
013import java.util.Optional;
014import org.slf4j.Logger;
015import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
016
017/**
018 * Entry point for running the assemble pipeline over captured segments.
019 *
020 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
021 */
022public final class AssembleCli {
023  private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(AssembleCli.class);
024  private static final String SUMMARY_USAGE =
025      "usage: assemble in=PATH|in=kafka:TOPIC out=PATH [ioMode=FILE|KAFKA] "
026          + "[httpOut=PATH] [tnOut=PATH] [httpEnabled=true|false] [tnEnabled=true|false] "
027          + "[kafkaBootstrap=HOST:PORT] [--dry-run] [--allow-overwrite]";
028  private static final String HELP_TEXT = """
029      RADAR assemble pipeline
030
031      Usage:
032        assemble in=./cap-out out=./pairs-out [options]
033
034      Required:
035        in=PATH|in=kafka:TOPIC   Segment input directory or Kafka topic
036        out=PATH                 Output directory root when writing files
037
038      Optional (validated):
039        httpOut=PATH             Override HTTP output directory
040        tnOut=PATH               Override TN3270 output directory
041        ioMode=FILE|KAFKA        FILE reads from directories; KAFKA requires kafkaBootstrap
042        kafkaBootstrap=HOST:PORT Validated host/port when Kafka input/output configured
043        kafkaSegmentsTopic=TOPIC Sanitized topic supplying segments
044        kafkaHttpPairsTopic=TOPIC Sanitized topic for HTTP pairs
045        kafkaTnPairsTopic=TOPIC  Sanitized topic for TN3270 pairs
046        httpEnabled=true|false   Enable HTTP reconstruction (default true)
047        tnEnabled=true|false     Enable TN3270 reconstruction (default false)
048        --dry-run                Validate inputs and print plan without assembling
049        --allow-overwrite        Permit writing into non-empty output directories
050        --verbose                Enable DEBUG logging
051        --help                   Show this message
052
053      Notes:
054        ? Paths are canonicalized; directories must exist (for inputs) or be empty unless --allow-overwrite.
055        ? Kafka topics are constrained to [A-Za-z0-9._-].
056      """;
057
058  private AssembleCli() {}
059
060  /**
061   * Entry point invoked by the JVM.
062   *
063   * @param args raw CLI arguments
064   */
065  public static void main(String[] args) {
066    ExitCode exit = run(args);
067    System.exit(exit.code());
068  }
069
070  /**
071   * Executes the assemble CLI logic using structured logging and exit codes.
072   *
073   * @param args raw CLI arguments
074   * @return exit code capturing the outcome
075   */
076  static ExitCode run(String[] args) {
077    CliInput input = CliInput.parse(args);
078    if (input.help()) {
079      CliPrinter.println(HELP_TEXT.stripTrailing());
080      return ExitCode.SUCCESS;
081    }
082    if (input.verbose()) {
083      LoggingConfigurator.enableVerboseLogging();
084      log.debug("Verbose logging enabled for assemble CLI");
085    }
086
087    boolean dryRun = input.hasFlag("--dry-run");
088    boolean allowOverwrite = input.hasFlag("--allow-overwrite");
089
090    Map<String, String> kv;
091    try {
092      kv = CliArgsParser.toMap(input.keyValueArgs());
093    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
094      log.error("Invalid argument: {}", ex.getMessage());
095      CliPrinter.println(SUMMARY_USAGE);
096      return ExitCode.INVALID_ARGS;
097    }
098
099    AssembleConfig config;
100    try {
101      config = AssembleConfig.fromMap(kv);
102    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
103      log.error("Invalid assemble arguments: {}", ex.getMessage());
104      CliPrinter.println(SUMMARY_USAGE);
105      return ExitCode.INVALID_ARGS;
106    }
107
108    ValidatedPaths validated;
109    try {
110      validated = validatePaths(config, allowOverwrite, !dryRun);
111    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
112      log.error("Invalid assemble path configuration: {}", ex.getMessage());
113      CliPrinter.println(SUMMARY_USAGE);
114      return ExitCode.INVALID_ARGS;
115    }
116
117    if (dryRun) {
118      printDryRunPlan(config, validated, allowOverwrite);
119      return ExitCode.SUCCESS;
120    }
121
122    CompositionRoot root = new CompositionRoot(ca.gc.cra.radar.config.Config.defaults());
123    AssembleUseCase useCase = root.assembleUseCase(config);
124
125    try {
126      useCase.run();
127      log.info("Assemble pipeline completed for input {}", validated.input());
128      return ExitCode.SUCCESS;
129    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
130      log.error("Assemble configuration error: {}", ex.getMessage(), ex);
131      return ExitCode.CONFIG_ERROR;
132    } catch (IOException ex) {
133      log.error("Assemble pipeline I/O failure while processing {}", validated.input(), ex);
134      return ExitCode.IO_ERROR;
135    } catch (InterruptedException ex) {
136      Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
137      log.error("Assemble pipeline interrupted; shutting down", ex);
138      return ExitCode.INTERRUPTED;
139    } catch (RuntimeException ex) {
140      log.error("Unexpected runtime failure in assemble pipeline", ex);
141      return ExitCode.RUNTIME_FAILURE;
142    } catch (Exception ex) {
143      log.error("Unexpected checked exception in assemble pipeline", ex);
144      return ExitCode.RUNTIME_FAILURE;
145    }
146  }
147
148  private static ValidatedPaths validatePaths(
149      AssembleConfig config, boolean allowOverwrite, boolean createIfMissing) {
150    Path input = config.inputDirectory();
151    if (config.ioMode() == IoMode.FILE) {
152      input = ensureReadableDirectory(input);
153    }
154
155    Path outputRoot = Paths.validateWritableDir(config.outputDirectory(), null, createIfMissing, allowOverwrite);
156    Optional<Path> http = config.httpOutputDirectory()
157        .map(path -> Paths.validateWritableDir(path, null, createIfMissing, allowOverwrite))
158        .or(() -> Optional.of(Paths.validateWritableDir(
159            config.outputDirectory().resolve("http"), null, createIfMissing, allowOverwrite)));
160    Optional<Path> tn = config.tnOutputDirectory()
161        .map(path -> Paths.validateWritableDir(path, null, createIfMissing, allowOverwrite))
162        .or(() -> Optional.of(Paths.validateWritableDir(
163            config.outputDirectory().resolve("tn3270"), null, createIfMissing, allowOverwrite)));
164
165    return new ValidatedPaths(input, outputRoot, http.orElse(null), tn.orElse(null));
166  }
167
168  private static Path ensureReadableDirectory(Path path) {
169    try {
170      Path real = path.toRealPath();
171      if (!Files.isDirectory(real)) {
172        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Input directory must exist: " + path);
173      }
174      if (!Files.isReadable(real)) {
175        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Input directory is not readable: " + path);
176      }
177      return real;
178    } catch (IOException ex) {
179      throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unable to access input directory: " + path, ex);
180    }
181  }
182
183  private static void printDryRunPlan(
184      AssembleConfig config, ValidatedPaths paths, boolean allowOverwrite) {
185    CliPrinter.printLines(
186        "Assemble dry-run: no files will be produced.",
187        " Input mode        : " + config.ioMode(),
188        " Input directory   : " + (config.ioMode() == IoMode.FILE ? paths.input() : "<Kafka>"),
189        " Output root       : " + paths.outputRoot(),
190        " HTTP enabled      : " + config.httpEnabled(),
191        " TN3270 enabled    : " + config.tnEnabled(),
192        " HTTP out dir      : " + (paths.http() == null ? "<derived>" : paths.http()),
193        " TN3270 out dir    : " + (paths.tn() == null ? "<derived>" : paths.tn()),
194        " Kafka bootstrap   : " + config.kafkaBootstrap().orElse("<none>"),
195        " Kafka segments    : " + config.kafkaSegmentsTopic(),
196        " Kafka HTTP pairs  : " + config.kafkaHttpPairsTopic(),
197        " Kafka TN pairs    : " + config.kafkaTnPairsTopic(),
198        " Allow overwrite   : " + allowOverwrite,
199        " Re-run without --dry-run to assemble segments.");
200  }
201
202  private record ValidatedPaths(Path input, Path outputRoot, Path http, Path tn) {}
203}
204
